description: Returns a description of this MSK VPC connection.

parameters.name: Arn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies a MSK VPC connection.

nested_items.name: VpcConnectionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies a MSK VPC connection.

nested_items.name: TargetClusterArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies an MSK cluster.

nested_items.name: Authentication
nested_items.description: The authentication type of VPC connection.

nested_items.name: VpcId
nested_items.description: The VPC Id for the VPC connection.

nested_items.name: Subnets
nested_items.description: The list of subnets for the VPC connection.

nested_items.name: SecurityGroups
nested_items.description: The list of security groups for the VPC connection.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The creation time of the VPC connection.
